entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
